title: A3
body:
<<place a3_losangeles>>

[[“Take the bundle of battery rods” |A4A]]
[[“Take the stash of dried food” |A4A]]

title: A5
body:
<<place a5_tijuana>>

[[“It’s for the best to cut ties now before morale worsens. The group decide to split their resource and send them back to Santa Barbara.” |A6]]
[[“It’s too early to quit now, turning back will only inevitably end in death. The group convinces the stragglers that they must continue their mission if they are to survive.” |A6]]

title: A7
body:
<<place a7_california>>

[[“Turn around and take the route towards the Sonora inland. We do not want to take any unnecessary risks” |A8A]]
[[“Cut through the gulf, we’ve taken similar detours back in the border, there is no time to waste.” |A8B]]

title: A8A
body:
<<place a8a_sonora>>

[[“Begin preparations to climb the mountain face” |A8A2]]

title: A8A2
body:
<<place a8a2_sonora>>

[[“The group must push on. Their valiance will be remembered.” |A9]]

title: A8B2
body:
<<place a8b2_california>>

[[“The group has to run before engulfing more members. Their courage will forever be remembered” |A9]]

title: A9
body:
<<place a9_sinaloa>>

[[“The group digs in the snow and sets camp. Some desperately needed rest was needed, and nearly everyone passes out immediately.” |A10]]

title: A12
body:
<<place a12_sinaloa>>{{bunker_scientist}}

[[“Try to convince the scientist to join our cause. There is nothing left for him here, only death. Perhaps he can find answers at Fortaleza.” |A13]]
[[“Continue forwards and respect the man’s mission. We do not have the right to drag him out of his last remaining wishes, especially in this god forsaken world” |A13]]
